title: Design and Operation of Electronic Field Trips (EFT) to Strengthen STEM Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Understanding of STEM Fields and Experience with Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Strengthening Capabilities in Designing and Operating Electronic Field Trips (EFT) to Improve Accessibility and Effectiveness of STEM Field Learning for University Students

learning_goals: Learners can explain the design principles and technical requirements of Electronic Field Trips (EFT)
Learners can produce STEM field learning content using real-time interactive platforms
Learners can plan and evaluate EFT operation processes involving collaboration among teachers, experts, and learners
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
